desc: A rare crystal used to evolve the mock Unit based on Karl
lore: A rare crystal that radiates blue light. It is an item required to evolve the mock Unit modeled after Karl even further. It is believed to contain his memories of the time he fought the demon Barion in his true form, faced the truth of his birth, and gained the ability to use demonic powers freely. Noel and Rhynt refined this crystal, though the notorious demon-hater Noel looked displeased throughout the entire process.
name: Grand Sapphire
